department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This Notice contains requirement amongst the General Stream from product category 6 and contains products that are Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA) for office furniture and requires delivery and installation between 2024/03/04 and 2024/05/04 to Gatineau, Quebec (Hull).
description: This Notice covers a requirement amongst the General Stream from product category 6 and contains products that are Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA). PSPC has a requirement for the purchase of office furniture, for delivery and installation between 2024/03/04 and 2024/05/04 to Gatineau, Quebec (Hull)..There is no security requirement associated with the requirement.
full_summary:
# EN439-240497 LTDLC Phase 1A.2 – Cat 6 Workspaces
## Title Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a tender for the supply and installation of office furniture, falling under the General Stream within product category 6.

## Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4204090362
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-19
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-19 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-10-11
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-27
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

## Business Requirements
PSPC is seeking proposals for the procurement of office furniture to be delivered and installed between 2024/03/04 and 2024/05/04 in Gatineau, Quebec (Hull). The procurement falls under the General Stream within product category 6 and includes products not covered by a Supply Arrangement (NSA).

## Tender Evaluation 
The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted. 

## Eligibility and Participation 
The solicitation is open to suppliers who have the necessary qualifications and certifications. 

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5.

## Contact Information 
If you need further clarification, please contact Nancy Sell, PSPC, at nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Document URL
The tender notice can be found at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17492249?extsite=MTc0OTIyNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Disclaimer
This tender is Exired
Please note that this tender has expired and is no longer available for submission. Suppliers are encouraged to sign up for public tenders on the PSPC website to receive notifications about upcoming tender opportunities.
